results.title: Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of simvastatin and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental embolic stroke.
results.text_hl: Our data show that combining @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration with BMSCs has an additive effect on improving functional outcome in this @<m>DISEASE_Thromboembolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013923 @@@thromboembolic stroke@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Pirzad Jahromi G, Seidi S, Sadr SS, Shabanzadeh AP, Keshavarz M, Kaka GR, Hosseini SK, Sohanaki H, Charish J. Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of simvastatin and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental embolic stroke. Basic Clin Pharmacol Toxicol. 2012 Jun;110(6):487-93. PMID: 22182305
